name: Overtale: The Day Of Fantasy
description:
Overtale : The Day Of Fantasy

The Sequel To Undertale

When Using The Good Ending Of The Game

Here Is The Link To Play It

Here:https://flowlab.io/game/play/1452889

Date: August 3rd 2020

Control

Arrow Keys To Move Valentino

Click To Use The Battle Command

Story / Plot

After The Event Of Undertale, When The Human World And The Monster World Fused Together As One World It All Thanks To Frisk And His Friend Saving The World And Making Flowey Turn Back Into Asriel Flying To The Sky. Frisk Gone Back Home To Be With His Parent. Ten Years Later... The Unseen Monster Entered Asgore Castle And Ready To Take Over The Castle To Cause Corruption And Asgore Was Getting Scary To Entered That Door To Rule His Kingdom. A Day Later A Young Boy Named Valentino Was Thinking About Starting Off His Adventure After Hearing News About Asgore Castle Was Being Take Over And Valentino Start His Journey And Ready To Enter Asgore Caste To Save It From Being Corrupt.
